input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Christmas Tree Skirt"
Reference Product Description:
Usher in the warmth and charm of the holiday season with National Tree Company's Christmas Tree Collar. This 54 inch, red ruffle tree skirt surrounds the base of your trimmed tree to add a finishing touch to your Christmas decoration arrangement. The two-part design provides a clean, attractive finishing touch that will add a distinctive flair to your Christmas holiday centerpiece. Constructed with strong polyester materials, this seasonal decoration is sturdy and durable, allowing it to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Place this adorable skirt around the base of your tree to add a festive feel to any family room or living space. At National Tree Company, we strive to create high quality Christmas decorations to help you transform your home so you can keep making every holiday moment magical.

This 54 inch, red ruffle tree skirt surrounds the base of your trimmed tree to add a finishing touch to your Christmas decoration arrangement.
The two-part design provides a clean, attractive finishing touch that will add a distinctive flair to your Christmas holiday centerpiece.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Set aside 45-60 minutes to properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories do not have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Balsam Hill Green BH Balsam Fir Garland Set of 2'
  - Name='FRONTGate Christmas Cheer Cordless Teardrop Swag with Bow'
  - Name='FRONTGate Christmas Cheer Cordless Garland with Bow'
  - Name='HGTV Home Collection 52" Embroidered Evergreens Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Glitzhome 72"D Oversized Deluxe Velvet Ruffled Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Haute Decor Santa's Surprise Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Balsam Hill 11" Gray Woven Tree Collar'
  - Name='The Home Depot Home Accents Holiday Tree Collar'
  - Name='HOMCOM 26" Steel Christmas Tree Collar Tree Ring Skirt'
  - Name='Bungalow Flooring Waterhog Pine Tree Skirt Mat'
  - Name='Glitzhome 22" Gold Metal Christmas Tree Collar'
  - Name='BarnwoodUSA Rustic Farmhouse Deluxe Reclaimed Wood Christmas Tree Box Collar'
  - Name='BarnwoodUSA Rustic Farmhouse Decorative Christmas Tree Box Collar'
  - Name='Joyfy 48" White Faux Fur Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='FRONTGate Regal Splendor Teardrop Swag'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm Metal Christmas Tree Collar'
  - Name='Northlight 48" Purple and Silver Glittered Floral Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Gardenised Large Rattan Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Lovemyfabric Crinkle Crushed Pattern Tree Skirt'
  - Name='NorthLight 48" Red and Green Plaid Rustic Woodland Christmas Tree Skirt with Green Trim'
  - Name='Transpac 48 in. Holiday Neutral Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Dyno 48" Red and Green Plaid Christmas Tree Skirt with Plush Border'
  - Name='Glamour Time 54" Black and Beige Rhinestone Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Northlight 36" Red and White Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Vickerman 54" Navy Colorway Treeskirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Green BH Balsam Fir Garland Set of 2
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product is a garland, used for decorating mantels or banisters, and is not functionally or structurally similar to a tree skirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: FRONTGate Christmas Cheer Cordless Teardrop Swag with Bow
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A teardrop swag is a hanging decoration for doors or walls, not related in function or construction to a tree skirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: FRONTGate Christmas Cheer Cordless Garland with Bow
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a garland, which is a different category of decorative product and does not share the functional or structural features of a tree skirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: HGTV Home Collection 52" Embroidered Evergreens Tree Skirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product is a tree skirt with features and intended use almost identical to the reference product. The only difference is minor: measurement and decorative details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Glitzhome 72"D Oversized Deluxe Velvet Ruffled Christmas Tree Skirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a tree skirt with a similar functional purpose and construction, and the ruffled feature closely matches the reference product. The only differences are size and material details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Haute Decor Santa's Surprise Tree Skirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A tree skirt designed for use around the base of a Christmas tree, serving the same core function as the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill 11" Gray Woven Tree Collar
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a tree collar, which is an alternative to a tree skirt and serves a similar functional purpose (covering the tree stand), but typically constructed differently (often hard material rather than fabric).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Home Depot Home Accents Holiday Tree Collar
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A tree collar serves an overlapping purpose with a tree skirt (covering tree base). Main difference is the construction (usually hard-sided).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: HOMCOM 26" Steel Christmas Tree Collar Tree Ring Skirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Steel tree collar serves the same purpose as a tree skirt, but is constructed from hard materials. Functional overlap is high, but form/materials differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bungalow Flooring Waterhog Pine Tree Skirt Mat
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A tree skirt mat serves the same functional goal as a fabric tree skirt, though possibly focuses more on protection from water but still covers tree base.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Glitzhome 22" Gold Metal Christmas Tree Collar
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A metal tree collar covers the tree base, like a tree skirt, but is structurally different (rigid versus soft/fabric).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: BarnwoodUSA Rustic Farmhouse Deluxe Reclaimed Wood Christmas Tree Box Collar
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A wood box collar covers the tree base but is a hard construction and aesthetically quite different from a skirt, though with related core purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: BarnwoodUSA Rustic Farmhouse Decorative Christmas Tree Box Collar
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Decorative wood box collar is functionally similar (covering the base) but structurally very different from a fabric tree skirt.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: A fabric tree skirt meant to cover the base of a tree, same silhouette and use as the reference, main difference is likely material.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: A teardrop swag is for wall/door decoration, not relevant to tree base covers.
